description.value:
Wondrous item, common
While you hold this broad, tall mug, any liquid placed inside it warms or cools to exactly the temperature you want it, though the mug canâ€™t freeze or boil the liquid. If you drop the mug or it is knocked from your hand, it always lands upright without spilling its contents.
